answerText: Midnight's Children[10] This man wrote Midnight's Children, and a fatwa was issued against him after he published The Satanic Verses.
heading: Collegiate Novice |2012 | 8 | 4 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The protagonist of this novel was switched at birth with Shiva by Mary Pereira.  [10]  Name this novel whose protagonist, a telepath with a runny nose named Saleem Sinai, is one of the title characters who were born at the exact time of India's independence.
